text:
What to give mom for New Year
06 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Artyom Kozoriz
Gifts that will please the dearest person and make life easier.
1. Plaid



Plaid is the perfect gift for cozy winter evenings. Especially if it is soft, large knit or with unusual sleeves. In any case, this beautiful and practical thing will not only warm, but also cheer you up.
What to buy


Coarse plaid with AliExpress, from 1 285 rubles ‚Üí


Plaid with tassels from Arloni, 2 590 rubles ‚Üí


Striped plaid from Estia, 6 890 rubles ‚Üí


Plaid with a pattern from Karna, 3 169 rubles ‚Üí


Plaid with sleeves and a hood from Oysho, 3 599 rubles ‚Üí


Plaid with fur pompons from Sofi De Marko, 3 718 rubles ‚Üí


2. A set of cosmetics



Surely mom will like a set of products for comprehensive skin care of the body or face. Just don‚Äôt give something simple and inexpensive. She would buy this for herself. On New Year's Eve, it is better to pamper mom with what she had long dreamed of.
What to buy


A set of cosmetics with pomegranate extract for facial skin with AliExpress, 998 rubles ‚Üí


A set of travel cosmetics for facial skin care from Uriage, 762 rubles ‚Üí


Ameliorate cosmetics kit for body skin care, 1 690 rubles ‚Üí


A set of cosmetics for skin care from Alvin D‚Äôor, 225 rubles ‚Üí


A set of cosmetics for hair and body skin care from ARS, 1 070 rubles ‚Üí


A set of creams for the care of skin from Yves Rocher, 719 rubles ‚Üí


A set of cosmetics for the care of skin of the hands and body from L‚ÄôOccitane, 1 760 rubles ‚Üí


3. Photo frame



Useful gadget for easy viewing photos. Replace albums, will not spend money on printing pictures, and even show the video. In addition, mom will always be surrounded by pleasant memories of happy moments.
What to buy


Digital photo frame with remote control from AliExpress, 2 455 rubles ‚Üí


Digital photo frame with built-in alarm clock, calendar and clock Ritmix RDF ‚Äë 828, 4 490 rubles ‚Üí


Digital photo frame with calendar, clock and remote control Digma PF ‚Äë 1033, 4 360 rubles ‚Üí


Digital photo frame with calendar Digma PF ‚Äë 902, 2 450 rubles ‚Üí


Digital photo frame with calendar and control panel Digma PF ‚Äë 922, 3 100 rubles ‚Üí


4. Towel



This necessary thing will definitely not gather dust in the closet. You can buy cute models with New Year prints. Or choose plain, but pack them beautifully. A great gift will also be sets of several towels for different needs.
What to buy


A set of three towels with New Year prints from AliExpress, 559 rubles ‚Üí


Set of four towels Bale from Karna, 1 598 rubles ‚Üí


Bath towel with a textured pattern from La Redoute Interieurs, 799 rubles ‚Üí


Terry jacquard towel from La Redoute Interieurs, 1 199 rubles ‚Üí


Set of two Petek terry towels from Karna, 698 rubles ‚Üí


Bath towel Esra from Karna, 1 077 rubles ‚Üí


5. The teapot



This gift is useful during family tea parties. The main thing is to choose the one that looks beautiful and unusual and fits into the interior of the kitchen.
What to buy


Glass teapot with strainer with AliExpress, from 458 rubles ‚Üí


Glass teapot with a pattern from Rondell, 1 090 rubles ‚Üí


Ceramic teapot from Le Creuset, 4 990 rubles ‚Üí


Ceramic teapot in the form of Santa Claus, 395 rubles ‚Üí


Teapot-jug from Polo, 1 602 rubles ‚Üí


Tea set of nine items on a wooden stand, 3 173 rubles ‚Üí


Tea set of 14 items from Loraine, 1 273 rubles ‚Üí


6. Multi-baker



A wonderful device that, thanks to interchangeable panels, can replace an ordinary grill, waffle iron, sandwich maker and more. In addition, a useful thing takes up a minimum of space in the kitchen.
Usually only one replacement panel is included. Therefore, in order to surely please mom, buy a couple more.
What to buy


Multibaker 40 in 1 Redmond RMB ‚Äë M604, 1 995 rubles ‚Üí


Multi-baker Redmond RMB ‚Äë 611, 2 590 rubles ‚Üí


Multi-baker Redmond RMB ‚Äë M600, 790 rubles ‚Üí


7. Massager



The massager will relieve stress after a hard day, relax and give a feeling of lightness. You can use it at home, without wasting time visiting massage parlors.
What to buy


Massager with heated legs with AliExpress, 2 893 rubles ‚Üí


Massager for buttocks, hips, shoulders and lower back from Beurer, 2 490 rubles ‚Üí


Massager for the prevention and correction of age-related skin changes from Supra, 2,220 rubles ‚Üí


Massager for the neck Medisana NM 860, 4 990 rubles ‚Üí


Massager Beurer MG149, 3 990 rubles ‚Üí


Massager for back, neck, arms and legs from Beurer, 850 rubles ‚Üí


8. Spice jars



Another necessary thing in the kitchen. You can buy minimalistic metal jars with a magnetic holder or unusual options with patterns. The main thing is that they go to the interior and your mom likes it.
What to buy


A set of metal jars for spices with stickers and a magnetic holder with AliExpress, from 484 rubles ‚Üí


Set for storing spices from Elan Gallery, 1 701 rubles ‚Üí


Set for spices with a wooden stand from Mayer & Boch, 1 360 rubles ‚Üí


Sets for spices
with stand
¬†from Mayer & Boch, 638 rubles ‚Üí


Set for spices made of bamboo and glass, 2 087 rubles ‚Üí


9. Home slippers



Soft slippers will remind mom of you every time she puts them on. And they will warm their feet on winter evenings and add comfort even on the most ordinary day.
There are a lot of options: with a fur trim, interesting patterns, pompons or animal faces.
What to buy


Slippers with fur trim with AliExpress, 551 rubles ‚Üí


Faux fur slippers with ears from women‚Äôsecret, 950 rubles ‚Üí


Slippers-loafers with natural fur from Oysho, 3 599 rubles ‚Üí


Slippers with a pompom from Oysho, 1 999 rubles ‚Üí


Velvet slippers-Czechs from Marks & Spencer, 690 rubles ‚Üí


Slippers with bows from Asos Design, 1 090 rubles ‚Üí


Slippers-boots from New Look, 1 190 rubles ‚Üí


10. Set for manicure



Bringing beauty on your hands at home is possible if mom has a cool manicure set with all the necessary tools and accessories. You can change the design of nails at least every day and process them as needed, and not when there are empty seats in the cabin.
What to buy


Set with a UV lamp, nail files, gel polishes and other accessories for manicure with AliExpress, from 1 122 rubles ‚Üí


Device with attachments for hardware manicure and pedicure from Sanitas, 3 290 rubles ‚Üí


11. Flower pots



Lovers of indoor plants can be presented with beautiful flower pots, planters and fresh flowers, which, with proper care, will delight for many years.
What to buy


A set of three ceramic pots and a wooden stand with AliExpress, from 1 049 rubles ‚Üí


Flower pot with a design in the form of a dog from Sass & Belle, 590 rubles ‚Üí


A recycled plastic flower pot from Ian Snow, 490 rubles ‚Üí


Yellow flower pot on the legs from Bloomingville, 1 490 rubles ‚Üí


Hanging planter from Asos Supply, 790 rubles ‚Üí


Spathiphyllum, 469 rubles ‚Üí


Begonia elator, 369 rubles ‚Üí


12. Confectionery



If your mother loves to bake cakes, muffins and various cakes, please her with a set of tools for decorating baking. Forms for cookies and pies are also among the pleasant and useful gifts.
What to buy


A set of tools for decorating baking with AliExpress, 1 635 rubles ‚Üí


Silicone baking dish from TalleR, 420 rubles ‚Üí


Silicone baking dish in the form of a heart from TalleR, 490 rubles ‚Üí


Metal baking dish from Tefal, 790 rubles ‚Üí


Confectionery pencil from Tescoma, 1,000 rubles ‚Üí


Set for the preparation of traditional shortbread cookies from Tescoma, 316 rubles ‚Üí


13. Painting for coloring



Such a gift will help mom to feel like a real artist and get distracted, completely immersed in the creative process. Together with the canvas, all the necessary tools are sold: paints and brushes of different sizes.
What to buy


Painting with a winter landscape with AliExpress, from 452 rubles ‚Üí


The painting "Lighthouse in the Gulf", 805 rubles ‚Üí


The painting "The Front Garden", 3 490 rubles ‚Üí


Painting according to the numbers "Garden Still Life", 1 318 rubles ‚Üí


Painting by numbers "Poppies", 3 490 rubles ‚Üí


Painting according to numbers "Solemn bouquet", 870 rubles ‚Üí


14. A set of tacks



Cute kitchen potholders will always cheer you up and help your mom create culinary masterpieces.
What to buy


Mittens with different patterns with AliExpress, 221 rubles ‚Üí


New Year's set of apron and potholders from Typo, 1 290 rubles ‚Üí


Set of square potholders, mittens and towels from Primavelle, 586 rubles ‚Üí


Tack with a drawing of Paris from Shining Star, 1 290 rubles ‚Üí


15. Orthopedic pillow



A moderately soft pillow of a special shape for proper support of the head during sleep. Allows mom to get enough sleep and get rid of neck pain.
What to buy


Orthopedic pillow with AliExpress, from 1 497 rubles ‚Üí


Orthopedic pillow from MemorySleep, 2 499 rubles ‚Üí


Orthopedic pillow from Smart ‚Äë Textile, 1,599 rubles ‚Üí


Orthopedic pillow with memory effect from Trives, 2 800 rubles ‚Üí


16. Vegetable slicer



Another assistant in the kitchen. Vegetable slicer will instantly chop any vegetables with straws, even with even plates. If you have enough budget, take a look at food processors. Such devices make life much easier.
What to buy


Vegetable slicer with interchangeable nozzles with AliExpress, from 482 rubles ‚Üí


Vegetable slicer from Status, 590 rubles ‚Üí


Food processor from Moulinex, 5 500 rubles ‚Üí


Food processor from Philips, 5 790 rubles ‚Üí


17. Home bathrobe



A cozy dressing gown made of soft material will perfectly warm you on a cold winter evening and envelop you in comfort. To make sure you like the gift, you should find out the size of clothes and mom‚Äôs favorite colors.
What to buy


Warm bathrobe with a hood and ears with AliExpress, 1 479 rubles ‚Üí


Terry bathrobe with a belt, 2 390 rubles ‚Üí


Dressing gown with a belt from Luisa Moretti, 5 750 rubles ‚Üí


Shortened dressing gown with pockets from Vis ‚Äë a ‚Äë Vis, 2,510 rubles ‚Üí


Checkered bathrobe with a pocket on his chest from Agape, 2 470 rubles ‚Üí


18. Aroma lamp and oil



The aroma lamp will fill the apartment with a pleasant unobtrusive aroma, help you relax and take a break from a busy day. DobaAdd some oils to the gift so that mom can immediately appreciate it.
What to buy


Vintage style aroma lamp with AliExpress, 669 rubles ‚Üí


Aroma lamp "Golden Deer", 1 690 rubles ‚Üí


Aroma lamp in the form of a blooming cactus, 295 rubles ‚Üí


Aroma lamp in the form of an owl, 295 rubles ‚Üí


Ylang-ylang essential oil, 165 rubles ‚Üí


Essential oil of orange, 70 rubles ‚Üí


Bergamot essential oil, 170 rubles ‚Üí


Patchouli essential oil, 335 rubles ‚Üí



Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.


UPD. The text was updated on November 6, 2019: more products were added to it and current prices were set.
